text: The above code in the footer does not seem to work (user visits are still being tracked). I'm going to try to move it to the header but I think there's a potential race condition issue with different things loading. Is there an event that triggers right before HubSpot starts tracking? Any other way to prevent it?

Hello,

Hope you're all doing well, I started today the integration of `HubSpot Tracker Code` into our website using `Google Tag Manager` and I can see it visible in the `Developers tap` , but I don't see the `HubSpotutk` cookie anywhere, I tried with multiple browsers and without any plugins to block cookies, how can I troubleshoot this ?

Thank you !
